name: Austrian Institute for European Law and Policy
goal:
Research institution working on European law related issues,
actual issues are inter alia:
EU + direct democracy + Civil Dialogues ( Art 11(1) and (2) TEU nv ) + EU Human Rights + EU Citizens´Rights * EU Referendum + Labour Law + Medical Law
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives:
European Citizens Initiative,
OPEN DIALOGUE BETWEEN INSTITUTIONS AND CITIZENS,
Medical Law,
Labour Law.
